page.shortlink: api client api a5 d date relative generate month method

argument.name: month
argument.description: The delta in months between two dates.

return.name: month
return.description: The correctly formatted representation of the delta in months.

page.description: Method used to generate how months should be representation in a relative date. For example turning "1" into "1 month", and "3" into "3 months". See *[link:Date.toRelative]*.
